thread.title: Jordan Brand Introduces New Formula 23 Lifestyle Sneaker
thread.title_full: Jordan Brand Introduces New Formula 23 Lifestyle Sneaker

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Jordan Brand Introduces New Formula 23 Lifestyle Sneaker
text:
Visit the original post to see all 8 images from this gallery. 
In translating iconic elements from the Air Jordan X into a modern lifestyle silhouette, today Jordan Brand introduces the Formula 23. The design of the shoe in turn embodies the brand’s rich heritage while supplying lightweight, street-ready cushioning for individuals on the go.
The upper webbing and gore lace accents are a nod to the aforementioned AJ X, while the Formula 23 also boasts a synthetic leather mudguard connected to the laces in order to provide lockdown and lateral support, while the neoprene collar then gives off a more comfortable sock-like fit. Lightweight cushioning is achieved thanks to the implementation of an Injected Phylon unit in the midsole, and a solid rubber outsole cage enhances traction and durability.
If you’re liking what you see from Jordan Brand and the Formula 23, you can pick up a pair of the new lifestyle sneaker today at select retail stores and online .
In other footwear-related news, Kanye West and adidas just confirmed the release date for the YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Core Black/Red.”
